title: Autocorrect Git Commands
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use Git's autocorrect feature to automatically correct mistyped Git commands, which can help improve your workflow and reduce errors when working with version control.

meta.title: Mastering Git Command Autocorrect
meta.description: Discover how to leverage Git's built-in autocorrect feature to streamline your development workflow and minimize errors.
meta.keywords: autocorrect, version control, git labs, git, git playground, command line, productivity

verify.name: Verify that the autocorrect function is configured correctly
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
